svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Share of people paying bribes vs. Corruption perception, 2013
The vertical axis shows scores in the Corruption Perception Index (2013 data, lower values reflect higher perceived
corruption). The horizontal axis shows the percentage of people who report having paid a bribe to access public
services in the last year (2013 data). Colors reflect world regions.
Share of people who have bribed
Source: CPI (Transparency International (2016)), Transparency International - GCB 2013
